sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERINFO(MEMBERNO, NAME, ID, NICK, PW, PHONE, BIRTH, SEX, ADDR, DETAILADDR, EMAIL1, EMAIL2,CITATION) VALUES (MEMBERINFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#memberName#,#memberId#,#memberNick#,#memberPw#,#phNumber#,SYSDATE,#radioBtn#,#addr#,#dAddr#,#email1#,#email2#,1)
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE ID = #memberId#
SELECT NICK FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE NICK = #memberNick#

SELECT COUNT(TRADE_NO) AS CNT FROM( SELECT TRADE_NO,WORD_TITLE,T.MEMBERNO FROM TRADE T INNER JOIN TRADEBOARD B ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = B.TRADE_WORD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON T.MEMBERNO = M.MEMBERNO ) A WHERE 1=1
AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND MEMBERNO = #sNo#

SELECT NO,TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS,TRADE_DATE,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T.TRADE_NO DESC) AS NO, TRADE_NO,ID,WORD_TITLE,BUY_PAY,TRADE_STATUS,ESCROW_WHETHER, TO_CHAR(TRADE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS TRADE_DATE FROM TRADE T INNER JOIN TRADEBOARD B ON T.TRADE_WORD_NO = B.TRADE_WORD_NO INNER JOIN TRADESTATUS S ON T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = S.TRADE_STATUS_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO I ON T.MEMBERNO = I.MEMBERNO
AND B.WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND I.MEMBERNO = #sNo#
) A WHERE A.NO BETWEEN #start# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(TRADE_NO) AS CNT FROM( SELECT TRADE_NO,B.MEMBERNO,WORD_TITLE FROM TRADEBOARD B INNER JOIN TRADE T ON B.TRADE_WORD_NO = T.TRADE_WORD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON B.MEMBERNO =M.MEMBERNO ) A WHERE 1=1
AND WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND MEMBERNO = #sNo#

SELECT NO,TRADE_NO,MEMBERNO,WORD_TITLE,TRADE_WORD_NO,TRADE_STATUS,TRADE_DATE ,TRADE_BOARD,ID,ESCROW_WHETHER FROM(
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T.TRADE_NO DESC) AS NO, TRADE_NO,B.MEMBERNO,WORD_TITLE,B.TRADE_WORD_NO,S.TRADE_STATUS,B.TRADE_BOARD,M.ID,T.ESCROW_WHETHER, TO_CHAR(TRADE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'||' '||'HH:MI:SS') AS TRADE_DATE FROM TRADEBOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADE T ON B.TRADE_WORD_NO = T.TRADE_WORD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERINFO M ON T.MEMBERNO =M.MEMBERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TRADESTATUS S ON T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = S.TRADE_STATUS_NO WHERE 1=1
AND B.WORD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%'
AND T.TRADE_STATUS_NO = 1 AND B.MEMBERNO = #sNo# )A
WHERE NO BETWEEN #start# AND #end#

SELECT TOTAL_M-TOTAL_B AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT SUM(CHARGE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_M,MEMBERNO FROM SANIPANIMONEY WHERE MEMBERNO=#sNo# GROUP BY MEMBERNO)
